description: Web Search Tool that performs web searches and returns results without opening a browser. It can also open URLs in the Brave browser or fetch content from a web page.

action.description: The action to perform: 'search', 'open', or 'fetch'. Defaults to 'search'.

url.description: The URL to open or fetch content from. Required for 'open' and 'fetch' actions.

searchQuery.description: The search query to use for the 'search' action. Required for 'search' action.

resultsCount.description: The number of search results to return. Defaults to 5.
